shrimp.name: Ctransform
shrimp.description: Transform to a different color space
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: from_space
input.description: The color space to transform from

input.name: to_space
input.description: The color space to transform to

shrimp.usage: Transforms the color C from fromspace to tospace. If fromspace isnt passed, its assumed to be RGB. Color spaces are rgb (red, green, and blue), hsv (hue, saturation, value), hsl (hue, saturation, lightness), xyz or XYZ (CIE XYZ coordinates), xyY (CIE xy and Y), and YIQ (NTSC coordinates).
